```{r, echo =FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
pulse_df = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

```

```{r}
pulse_tidy = 
  pulse_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bdi"
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    visit = replace(visit, visit == "bl", "00m") #remember to use double "=" when replace
  )


```
